settings.heading: It was a very good experience

settings.text: My 2018 Jeep Wrangler 3.6 just stranded me on the side of the road. The alternator failed. I was looking for a high output alternator anyway. Just didn't plan on it so soon. I found Copperstate on line. I purchased the 370 amp alternator and installed according to Copperstates instruction. I am getting 13.8 to 14.5 volts to the battery. I could not be happier. I promise to update this in one year. Thanks!

Am a business owner here in town, so I know good customer service. They are very informative and have quality parts. I purchased an alternator for one of my cars and for some reason had to go through two alternators in which they warranted out for me with no hassle. There pricing is very fair. They also custom build alternators for special builds. Just buy your next alternator, starter...

I've never been happy with the quality of the auto part store alternators I have used in the past and I needed the part quicker than what I could find online. I went looking for a local place to pick up an alternator.I found Tucson Alternator, they were incredibly friendly and their customer service was top notch. The alternator is functioning exactly as expected and since they have been in business for...
